Articles.Content:
I have suddenly been having a problem with my screen blacking out on launch. I can see my rocket for a second and then black with all the HUD visible.

This happened after my game crashed sending a craft to Eve. Thinking it had something to do with that craft I deleted it in the persistent.sfs but the problem continues.

I saw that it might be a mod issue but I haven't installed any new mods but i posted my mod list anyway. All mods have been installed through CKAN.

 

KSP: 1.0.5 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 8.1  (6.3.10586) 64bit

I figured out that it is being caused by mounting any nuclear engine to my rocket. Any help would be greatly appreciated as nuclear engines are very important.
